name: 'Welcome To Wherever You Are' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Molly and Huck dress up as for Halloween?
questions.explanation:
Baseball players.

	Toby bought them Yankee outfits to wear on Halloween, but they dressed up in the Oriole costumes Andy bought them. When Toby put them to bed, he hung a Yankee's baseball cap on Huck's bedpost and said, "Trust me, you'll be much happier". The Santos children dressed up as Harry Potter and a Fairy Queen.

questions.text: "It will be a privilege to play for the next President of the United States." Which musician made this comment to Santos?
questions.explanation:
Jon Bon Jovi.

	The title of this episode came from the title of a Jon Bon Jovi song. Jon Bon Jovi was seen throughout the entire episode. Lou thought he was fabulous.

questions.text: When the show began, Santos was getting onto his plane. What city were they in?
questions.explanation:
St. Louis

	When Donna, Annabeth, Santos, and Helen arrived back from a rally in St. Louis, Santos said, "Chicago, we hardly knew ya." Helen corrected him by saying they were in St. Louis and not Chicago.

questions.text: Whose back went out during the last five days of the campaign which forced the person to lie flat on a couch?
questions.explanation:
Lou.

	While on the bus, Lou was lying on the couch watching the ads for the last five days of the Vinick campaign. When Donna asked her if she was all right, Josh said her back went out. While watching the ads, Lou told everyone that Vinick's campaign was running with their ad.

questions.text: Which one of the women was the first to suggest that there was something more than friendship going on between Leo and Annabeth?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Donna made the comment that Annabeth was singing because of Leo. When Lou said that Annabeth was checking in with Leo, Helen made a comment that Lou and Donna understood, but left Josh and Santos in the dark.

questions.text: Santos said he spoke five languages.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Josh informed Santos that he was going to be giving an interview with Atrios. Santos thought he was going to be speaking with the interviewer, but Josh told him it was a blog. Santos wanted to type his own answers.

questions.text: What two cabinet members of the future Santos staff did Josh and Santos pick while on the plane to Texas?
questions.correct: Attorney General and Secretary of State
options: Secretary of Defense and Secretary of Agriculture
Secretary of the Navy and Secretary of Indian Affairs
Secretary of Education and Attorney General
questions.explanation:
Attorney General and Secretary of State.

	While in Santos' private area on the plane, Josh asked Santos if he liked Berry Goodwin and Nancy McNally. When Santos said he did, Josh told him they had just picked the new Attorney General and Secretary of State.

questions.text: Jay Leno wanted Santos to dress up as what character for a Halloween sketch?
questions.explanation:
Robin Hood.

	Donna talked to "The Tonight Show" writers and found out that Jay Leno wants Santos to dress up as Robin Hood for a sketch involving tax loopholes for the rich. No one, but Annabeth, wanted Santos to do it because he would have to wear tights.

questions.text: Did Josh admit to Santos that they were going to win?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	On the plane to Texas, Josh told Santos that he thought they were going to win.

questions.text: Did Toby reveal who gave him the information about the space shuttle?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Andy wanted Toby to say it was his deceased brother David who gave him the information, but Toby said he wasn't going to do that to his brother's memory.
